title: Godard & Mieville - De l'origine du XXIe siecle (2000)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0246866" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0246866</a>

Commissioned by the heads of the 2000 Cannes Film Festival to make an opening-night short commemorating cinema as it enters its second full century, Godard instead offers up a 17-minute barrage of re-edited footage of wars and Nazi atrocities, interspersed with clips of Maurice Chevalier in "Gigi" and Godard's own "A bout de souffle." Written by Josh Martin
